name: As within so without
description:
"as above so below, as within so without" so it is written. In the journey of life, the Soul and Body are components with each other to walk alone. Time will wipe out everything in the end, spiritually and physically. but your life footprint exists, and you are in charge of painting out what your life looks like. and after all, Time will also regard your life as pigments to create a "masterpiece", it is called history.

Use WASD keys and  arrows keys to control two characters.
